comment._content: I've never heard of this retail establishment before. The Hub Ltd. There is a 1939 pioc of The Hub Ltd Annual Staff Ball by Tom Lennon: www.powerhousemuseum.com/collection/database/?irn=381551

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called **Social Documentary Photography & events** (Post 1 Award 5) , and we'd love to have this added to the group! You are invited to add this superb documentary picture to: Social Documentary Photography
